name: AG1 - The Goblinoid Dungeons
description: This game is for Android and is the free version of the game supported by advertising. The objective of this old fashioned dungeon crawl game is to simply explore each level of the dungeon while defeating monsters and collecting loot. Use the arrow keys or the joystick at the bottom right of the screen to control movement. Press the space bar or click on the action button at the bottom left to perform the selected action. Click on the game menu button to go to the settings page to change actions or use the store. To successfully attack a monster you must be facing the monster. There are healing kits to use, armor to protect you with, weapons to use to make you a better fighter and your combat skills will SLOWLY get better as you defeat monsters. Your melee skill is shown at the bottom of the screen. Know also that your armor can also be damaged and destroyed when you take hits in the game. The number of hits your armor can take before it looses one point of protection and the current armor protection is shown at the bottom of the screen. You health is represented by a red bar at the top of the player. You can purchase additional items in the store to help you complete the game using tokens. You can also replay each level multiple times earning more experience and tokens each time
